results.title: An Elite School, a Boy’s Suicide and a Question of Blame
results.abstract: An eighth grader was asked to leave Saint Ann’s, a prestigious private school in Brooklyn. Three months later, he ended his life. Now his parents are suing the school.

media.caption: Ellis Lariviere’s bedroom at his family’s home in Red Hook, Brooklyn. When Ellis’s parents told him that Saint Ann’s would not allow him to return to school for the ninth grade, “it was devastating,” his father said.

results.title: Japan’s Native Ainu Fight to Restore a Last Vestige of Their Identity
results.abstract: A group representing the Indigenous people has sued to regain the right, lost over a century ago, to freely fish for salmon in a Hokkaido river.
